Jeffrey Schlupp says he is "loving it" on loan at Celtic and is open to signing talks over a permanent deal. (Scottish Sun), external
Celtic are likely to bank nearly Â£10m this summer from the sale of defender Gustaf Lagerbielke, who has impressed on loan at FC Twente, and their sell-on clause for in-demand Jeremie Frimpong, as a host of clubs chase the Bayer Leverkusen wing-back. (Daily Record), external
